name: Tee " City Bad Life" - FUZI for Birthday
description:
Fuzi (UV TPK) is a French artist whose trademark “ignorant style” embodies a naive, child-like approach. 
His work depicts violence, vandalism and sex which is a portrayal of his youth and influences. 
Throughout the 90’s, he was an active graffiti writer and was a founding member of the infamous UV TPK crew, 
well known in Paris for their graffiti on the streets, trains and subways. 
Fuzi is now working on paintings, drawings and photography. He exhibited in Amsterdam in November 2010 and will release his first book on February 2011.

He is collaborating with Birthday with its Tee " City Bad Life"

name: Tee HEDOF X Birthday
description:
Collaboration between Birthday x Hedof

Rick Berkelmans (1986) work is full of action and humour and exists of a strong mix of images, typography and colour. With his addiction to printing techniques he combines his fresh illustrations with a unique vintage look. The most important he thinks, is that his work has a certain attitude, casual but well thought out. A cool visual solution to the clients problem.

Since 2008 Rick runs his oneman design studio Hedof. As an illustrator / designer he works for all sorts of client-based projects in different forms of visual communication. He also enjoys self-initiated projects such as prints, T-shirts and zines, basically everything where his enthusiasm brings him. His work is regularly shown at exhibitions in the Netherlands and abroad and is available at this website. 
http://www.hedof.nl/

Only 25 pieces.

Size is for Men

name: Birthday x NEW ERA
description:
BIRTHDAY has teamed up with world famous New Era to design a custom 59fifty cap insipred by American Classics theme. Using timeless color for the street, the caps features an original logo from BIRTHDAY.

The cap is available in very small quantities
